Posts.Content: Thank you for posting.  I googled the side effects of this damn medication because I have been feeling horrible lately.  It occured to me that it may be side effects.  I have been on Anastrozole for 2 1/2 years now and have similar symptoms as you.  Zombie fatigue is the perfect way to describe how I feel.  I was begining to think I am crazy.  I also have some depression, inability to concentrate and body aches and pains. There are days when I feel like I am 90 years old. I am 57.  I am going to try the gluten free diet you suggested.  I just keep telling myself it's better than having a reoccurence
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Hi. I guess I am a little late.  I hope all went well for you.  It is extemely stressful to even think you may have cancer.  The tests are not bad, it's the waiting for results that makes you crazy.  I hope you don't have to go through any of that.
